name: Melvin THOMAS, et ux., petitioners, v. Tranzie LOVELESS, et ux.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied, and petition for writ of certiorari Court of Civil Appeals of Alabama dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
